name: Drop Dead Twice: The First Attack
name_original: Drop Dead Twice: The First Attack
description:
Drop Dead Twice: The First Attack is a prequel to Nownew Games' mobile game Drop Dead Twice. Control Furiosa as you shoot and explode zombies to stay alive!

Controls:

Arrow keys = Move

Z = Shoot

X = Drop land mine

C = Bullet time

V = Pause


Visit http://nownewgames.com for more games
